ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.INTRO: Hi, I’m a German-speaking Frontend Developer based in Hamburg. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
ABOUT.ITEM1: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site in Munich and remotely.
ABOUT.ITEM2: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
ABOUT.ITEM3: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

SKILLS.SKILL_SET_DESCRIPTION: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to continuously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
SKILLS.CONTACT_ME: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
SKILLS.INTEREST_IN_LEARNING: I have a special interest in learning

PROJECTS.INTRO_TEXT: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with
PROJECTS.INTRO_TEXT2: projects to see my skills in action.

JOIN.DESCRIPTION_TEXT: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

EL_POLLO_LOCO.DESCRIPTION_TEXT: Help El Pollo Loco collect coins and defeat enemies in this fun platform game. Developed using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact me
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
CONTACT.PRIVACY_AGREE: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.INTRODUCTION_TEXT: Welcome to my website. This privacy policy explains how I collect, use, and protect your personal data. By using this website, you agree to the terms described in this statement.
PRIVACY_POLICY.DATA_COLLECTION_TEXT: Personal data is only collected when you voluntarily provide it through contact forms or email communication. This includes name, email address, and phone number.
PRIVACY_POLICY.USE_OF_DATA_TEXT: The collected personal data is used solely to respond to your inquiries and provide the requested services. Data will only be shared with third parties with your consent.
PRIVACY_POLICY.DATA_PROTECTION_TEXT: I take reasonable security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage can be guaranteed to be absolutely secure.
PRIVACY_POLICY.DISCLAIMER_TEXT: The information on this website is provided 'as is' without warranties or representations. I accept no liability for any damages resulting from the use or inability to use this website or its contents. This includes, in particular, errors or omissions in the content as well as any loss or damage arising from the use of this website.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CHANGES_POLICY_TEXT: I reserve the right to update this privacy policy from time to time. Changes will be published on this page, and the date of revision will be updated. You should review this statement regularly to stay informed about any changes.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_INFORMATION_TEXT: If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy, you can reach me at the following contact details:
